description.value:
Stalkers in darkened boughs make their homes in ancient forests and jungles unfriendly to humanoids and others who would exert control or influence over nature's designs. These apparitions are drawn to animists who harbor violent thoughts or impulses but are more likely to linger with animists who can quell their hatred. Stalkers in darkened boughs are moody, impulsive, and prone to seeing things from the least charitable perspective.

Apparition Skills Forest Lore, Hunting Lore

Apparition Spells Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gouging Claw]; 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Body]; 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vomit Swarm]; 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns]; 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bestial Curse]; 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Moon Frenzy]; 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangling Creepers]; 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfettered Pack]; 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Monstrosity Form]; 9th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wrathful Storm]

Vessel Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkened Forest Form]

Avatar Beast of the Boughs Speed 70 feet, fly Speed 70 feet

Melee 1 devouring jaws (deadly 3d10, reach 15 feet), Damage @Damage[(6d10+6)[piercing]]
